name: example
description: Demo of bazel rules for angular

scripts.e2e-prodserver: concurrently "bazel run //src:prodserver" "while ! nc -z 127.0.0.1 8080; do sleep 1; done && protractor protractor.prodserver.conf.js" --kill-others --success first
scripts.e2e-devserver: concurrently "bazel run //src:devserver" "while ! nc -z 127.0.0.1 5432; do sleep 1; done && protractor protractor.devserver.conf.js" --kill-others --success first
scripts.buildifier: find . -type f \( -name BUILD -or -name BUILD.bazel \) ! -path "./node_modules/*" | xargs $(bazel info bazel-bin)/external/com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools/buildifier/*/buildifier
